Page Contents

    Contacting Brightcove Sales

    In this topic you will learn how to contact Brightcove Sales or your Account Manager.

    New to Brightcove?

    If you are new to Brightcove and interested in purchasing Brightcove products or services, you can contact our Sales organization by going to this page and filling out the form, or by calling one of the phone numbers listed at the bottom of that page.

    Already a customer?

    If you are already a Brightcove customer and interested in purchasing add-ons, additional products or services, contact you Customer Success Manager. If you are not sure who your Customer Success Manager is, open a support case, and someone in our Support organization will give you the information.
